scripts.build: mkdir -p public/build && env NODE_ENV=production ./node_modules/.bin/browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ react ] ] src/app.js -o public/build/bundle.js
scripts.watch: mkdir -p public/build &&   ./node_modules/.bin/watchify -t [ babelify --presets [ react ] ] src/app.js -o public/build/bundle.js
